title: How to Stage a Weightless Velvet Halo Suite
excerpt: Concierge styling tips for lighting, fabrics, and accessories that make your Velvet Halo™ swing the star of the room.
content:
The Velvet Halo™ suspension swing is the heart of many Skywalker suites. To help you create a scene that feels as lush as it looks, our concierge team pulled together their favorite staging notes.

Layer in Sensory Textures

Mix velvet with satin pillows, faux fur rugs, and breathable cotton throws. Keep your swing covers plush but easy to launder after a long night.

Light for Mood and Safety

Combine dimmable sconces with our Starlight mood clips. Aim for a soft glow on the swing while leaving anchor hardware visible.

Accessorize with Intention

  • CloudNine cushion pack for lumbar and hip support
  • Silkbound wrist and ankle cuffs for adventurous play
  • Stellar Clean & Care kit staged near the suite for aftercare
author: Skywalker Concierge

title: Ceiling Mount vs. A-Frame: Choosing Your Suspension Anchor
excerpt: We break down the pros, cons, and vibe of every Skywalker mounting option so you can play with confidence.
content:
Every Skywalker swing ships with a concierge walkthrough because the anchor you choose shapes your entire experience.

Ceiling Mount

Perfect for permanent suites and minimal footprints. Requires joist or beam access. Rated to 600 lb with redundant hardware.

Nebula A-Frame

Freestanding glam for rentals, studios, and content creators. Collapses in minutes, supports wide strap geometry, and travels discreetly.

Doorway Escape Kit

No-drill doorway mount for apartments or hotel adventures. Quick install, padded pressure points, and easily stashes under the bed.
author: Rigging Collective

title: Aftercare Rituals for Suspension Play
excerpt: From grounding touch to warm beverages, here’s how our intimacy coaches wind down a floating scene.
content:
Aftercare is the quiet glow after the high. Build time into every session to reconnect, hydrate, and support your bodies.

Check In and Ground

Use reassuring touch, weighted blankets, and breathwork to help partners land.

Soothe the Body

Warm towels, magnesium lotion, and herbal tea keep muscles relaxed after floating.

Refresh Your Swing

Swap covers for the wash, wipe hardware with toy-safe cleaner, and let textiles air dry before storing.
author: Intimacy Coach Circle
